original_text: The shepherds returned, glorifying and praising God for all the things they had heard and seen, which were just as they had been told.
korean_text: 목자들은 자기들에게 이르던 바와 같이 듣고 본 그 모든 것으로 인하여 하나님께 영광을 돌리고 찬송하며 돌아가니라

sentences.original_text: for all the things they had heard and seen
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 듣고 보았던 모든 것들에 대하여

sentences.original_text: which were just as they had been told
